title: Step Aside, Yule Log: NASA's Rocket Engine Fireplace
description: NASA's got a sense of humor. This holiday season, the company is offering up their version of the Yule Log. But rather than burning firewood, the NASA Rocket Engine Fireplace will keep you (visually) toasty with the Artemis I's propulsion source:"Technically, this fireplace packs the heat of FOUR RS-25 rocket engines and a pair of solid rocket boosters – just enough to get you to the Moon. (And get through the holidays with your in-laws.)"The oddly soothing video is here.
author: Rain Noe

html:
Step Aside, Yule Log: NASA's Rocket Engine Fireplace

NASA's got a sense of humor. This holiday season, the company is offering up their version of the Yule Log. But rather than burning firewood, the NASA Rocket Engine Fireplace will keep you (visually) toasty with the Artemis I's propulsion source:

"Technically, this fireplace packs the heat of FOUR RS-25 rocket engines and a pair of solid rocket boosters – just enough to get you to the Moon. (And get through the holidays with your in-laws.)"

The oddly soothing video is here.
